body_html:
@vrv In the PR the third_party/boringssl/add_boringssl_s390x.patch file has been deleted.

In tensorflow/workspace.bzl file, the boringssl section has been changed from patched_http_archive -> native.http_archive so patching is gone.

Also, in case s390x support is desired in TensorFlow in the future, from the comment link provided (#11170 (comment)) it is possible to disable the GCP support to handle the big-endian issue. I don't have any access to s390x so I might not be able to help in that case though.
